metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0182 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In exif_entry_get_value of exif-entry.c, there is a possible out of boundsread due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local informationdisclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10AndroidID: A-147140917

criterions.comment: libexif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
